# <a name="how-to-find-options-in-outlookcom-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="0fe41-102">Jak najít možnosti v nastavení Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0fe41-102">How to find options in Outlook.com settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0fe41-103">V horní části stránky klepněte na ikonu zařízení</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0fe41-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="0fe41-104">Chcete-li otevřít nastavení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0fe41-104">to open Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0fe41-105">V dolní části podokna nastavení vyberte [**Zobrazit všechna nastavení aplikace Outlook**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0fe41-105">At the bottom of the Settings pane, select [**View all Outlook settings**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0fe41-106">Zobrazí obecné, E-mail, kalendář a (pokud existuje) Premium nastavení a možností.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0fe41-106">This will show your General, Email, Calendar, and (if applicable) Premium settings and options.</span></span>
